Datepicker

Example

x-model: 
<div x-data="{ model: '' }" class="px-6">
  <div
    x-data="datepicker"
    x-model="model"
    class="overflow-hidden bg-white text-center text-gray-800 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-gray-300 w-[320px] overflow-hidden rounded-md border border-neutral-300 shadow-md dark:border-neutral-700 mx-auto"
  >
    <div class="my-4 grid grid-flow-col grid-cols-6">
      <button
        x-bind="prevYearButton"
        class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
      >
        <svg
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
          width="16"
          height="16"
          fill="currentColor"
          class="bi bi-chevron-double-left"
          viewBox="0 0 16 16"
        >
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M8.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L2.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
          />
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M12.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L6.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
          />
        </svg>
      </button>
      <button
        x-bind="prevMonthButton"
        class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
      >
        <svg
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
          width="16"
          height="16"
          fill="currentColor"
          class="bi bi-chevron-left"
          viewBox="0 0 16 16"
        >
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M11.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L5.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
          />
        </svg>
      </button>
      <div
        x-text="currentDate"
        class="col-span-2 inline-block font-bold"
      ></div>
      <button
        x-bind="nextMonthButton"
        class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
      >
        <svg
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
          width="16"
          height="16"
          fill="currentColor"
          class="bi bi-chevron-right"
          viewBox="0 0 16 16"
        >
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M4.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L10.293 8 4.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
          />
        </svg>
      </button>
      <button
        x-bind="nextYearButton"
        class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
      >
        <svg
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
          width="16"
          height="16"
          fill="currentColor"
          class="bi bi-chevron-double-right"
          viewBox="0 0 16 16"
        >
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M3.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L9.293 8 3.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
          />
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M7.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L13.293 8 7.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
          />
        </svg>
      </button>
    </div>
  
    <div class="mb-2 grid grid-cols-7">
      <template x-for="weekday in weekdays">
        <div
          x-text="weekday"
          class="text-sm font-semibold dark:text-gray-300"
        ></div>
      </template>
    </div>
  
    <div class="relative mb-2 grid grid-cols-7">
      <template x-for="d in days" :key="d.toISOString()">
        <button
          x-bind="day"
          x-text="d.getDate()"
          class="mx-1 my-1 flex h-9 w-9 cursor-pointer items-center justify-center rounded-full py-1 text-sm font-semibold hover:bg-neutral-200"
          class:today="!font-bold text-violet-400 dark:text-violet-400 border border-violet-400"
          class:adjacent="text-gray-800/20 dark:text-gray-200/10"
          class:selected="!text-white dark:text-gray-200 bg-violet-400 dark:bg-violet-500 hover:!bg-violet-600 dark:hover:bg-violet-700"
          class:selected-range="!text-white dark:text-gray-200 bg-violet-400 dark:bg-neutral-600 hover:!bg-violet-600 dark:hover:bg-neutral-500"
          class:partially-selected="text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-300 bg-gray-300 dark:bg-neutral-700"
        ></button>
      </template>
    </div>
  
    <div
      x-text="todayFormatted"
      class="bg-gray-100 py-1 text-sm font-semibold dark:bg-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-300"
    ></div>
  </div>

  <div class="font-mono text-lg mx-auto w-max mt-4">
    x-model: <span x-text="JSON.stringify(model)"></span>
  </div>
</div>

Usage

To use this component simply copy and paste minimal template or any template from the examples below.

The data for the component is provided by the datepicker function in the x-data directive. This function takes single object as argument.

datepicker({
    range: Boolean,
    mondayFirstWeekday: Boolean,
    adjacentMonths: Boolean,
    locale: String,
})
range
false Boolean

Allows selection of date ranges. Changing this prop resets component.

mondayFirstWeekday
true Boolean

Week starts on Monday

adjacentMonths
true Boolean

If true days from previous and next month are displayed. Classes for these days can be modified in the class:adjacent attribute in the template.

locale
en-GB String

This prop is only used to display names of the months and weekdays and to format date in the components footer. It does not modify format of the x-model date which is always YYYY-MM-DD.

x-model

x-model
String Array

The type of the x-model is a string in single mode and an array of two strings in range mode. Strings are always in th YYYY-MM-DD format.

Range mode

Datepicker allows selection of date ranges when range prop is enabled. In range mode instead of single date string component emits array of two strings.

Example

x-model: 
<div x-data="{ model: [] }" class="px-6">
  <div
    class="w-[320px] overflow-hidden rounded-md border border-neutral-300 shadow-md dark:border-neutral-700 mx-auto"
  >
    <div
      x-data="datepicker({
        range: true,
      })"
      x-model="model"
      class="overflow-hidden bg-white text-center text-gray-800 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-gray-300"
    >
      <div class="my-4 grid grid-flow-col grid-cols-6">
        <button
          x-bind="prevYearButton"
          class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
        >
          <svg
            xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
            width="16"
            height="16"
            fill="currentColor"
            class="bi bi-chevron-double-left"
            viewBox="0 0 16 16"
          >
            <path
              fill-rule="evenodd"
              d="M8.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L2.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
            />
            <path
              fill-rule="evenodd"
              d="M12.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L6.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
            />
          </svg>
        </button>
        <button
          x-bind="prevMonthButton"
          class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
        >
          <svg
            xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
            width="16"
            height="16"
            fill="currentColor"
            class="bi bi-chevron-left"
            viewBox="0 0 16 16"
          >
            <path
              fill-rule="evenodd"
              d="M11.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L5.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
            />
          </svg>
        </button>
        <div
          x-text="currentDate"
          class="col-span-2 inline-block font-bold"
        ></div>
        <button
          x-bind="nextMonthButton"
          class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
        >
          <svg
            xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
            width="16"
            height="16"
            fill="currentColor"
            class="bi bi-chevron-right"
            viewBox="0 0 16 16"
          >
            <path
              fill-rule="evenodd"
              d="M4.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L10.293 8 4.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
            />
          </svg>
        </button>
        <button
          x-bind="nextYearButton"
          class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
        >
          <svg
            xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
            width="16"
            height="16"
            fill="currentColor"
            class="bi bi-chevron-double-right"
            viewBox="0 0 16 16"
          >
            <path
              fill-rule="evenodd"
              d="M3.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L9.293 8 3.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
            />
            <path
              fill-rule="evenodd"
              d="M7.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L13.293 8 7.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
            />
          </svg>
        </button>
      </div>
  
      <div class="mb-2 grid grid-cols-7">
        <template x-for="weekday in weekdays">
          <div
            x-text="weekday"
            class="text-sm font-semibold dark:text-gray-300"
          ></div>
        </template>
      </div>
  
      <div class="relative mb-2 grid grid-cols-7">
        <template x-for="d in days" :key="d.toISOString()">
          <button
            x-bind="day"
            x-text="d.getDate()"
            class="mx-1 my-1 flex h-9 w-9 cursor-pointer items-center justify-center rounded-full py-1 text-sm font-semibold hover:bg-neutral-200"
            class:today="!font-bold text-violet-400 dark:text-violet-400 border border-violet-400"
            class:adjacent="text-gray-800/20 dark:text-gray-200/10"
            class:selected="!text-white dark:text-gray-200 bg-violet-400 dark:bg-violet-500 hover:!bg-violet-600 dark:hover:bg-violet-700"
            class:selected-range="!text-white dark:text-gray-200 bg-violet-400 dark:bg-neutral-600 hover:!bg-violet-600 dark:hover:bg-neutral-500"
            class:partially-selected="text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-300 bg-gray-300 dark:bg-neutral-700"
          ></button>
        </template>
      </div>
  
      <div
        x-text="todayFormatted"
        class="bg-gray-100 py-1 text-sm font-semibold dark:bg-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-300"
      ></div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="font-mono text-lg mx-auto w-max mt-4">
    x-model: <span x-text="JSON.stringify(model)"></span>
  </div>
</div>

Datepicker in dropdown

Example 

<div x-data="{ date: '' }">
  <div x-data="dropdown" @datepicker-selection-complete="close()">
    <div
      x-data="input"
      x-model="date"
      x-bind="trigger"
      class="flex flex-1 items-center rounded border border-gray-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 outline-none transition-shadow duration-200 focus-within:border-gray-400 focus-within:ring focus-within:ring-violet-200 focus:outline-none dark:border-neutral-600 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-gray-300 dark:focus-within:ring-violet-300"
    >
      <div class="mr-2"></div>
      <div class="mr-2"></div>
      <div class="flex flex-1 flex-wrap">
        <input
          x-bind="input"
          type="text"
          class="min-w-0 flex-1 border-0 bg-transparent p-0 outline-none focus:min-w-[64px] focus:outline-none"
        />
      </div>
      <div class="ml-2"></div>
      <div class="flex items-center">
        <div class="mr-2">
          <svg viewBox="25 25 50 50" fill="none" class="spinner-svg h-5 w-5">
            <circle
              cx="50"
              cy="50"
              r="20"
              stroke-width="4"
              stroke-miterlimit="10"
            />
          </svg>
        </div>
        <div>
          <button @click="clear()" class="flex items-center">
            <svg
              xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
              width="16"
              height="16"
              fill="currentColor"
              class="h-5 w-5 opacity-70"
              viewBox="0 0 16 16"
            >
              <path
                d="M2.146 2.854a.5.5 0 1 1 .708-.708L8 7.293l5.146-5.147a.5.5 0 0 1 .708.708L8.707 8l5.147 5.146a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708L8 8.707l-5.146 5.147a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L7.293 8z"
              />
            </svg>
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div
      x-bind="menu"
      x-cloak
      x-alt-transition="{
            enter: ['opacity-0 scale-y-[0.5]', 'transition ease-out duration-100 origin-top', 'opacity-100'],
            leave: ['opacity-100', 'transition ease-in duration-100 origin-top', 'opacity-0 scale-y-[0.5]'],
          }"
      class="z-10"
    >
      <div class="w-[320px] overflow-hidden rounded-md border border-neutral-300 shadow-md">
        <div
          x-data="datepicker"
          x-model="date"
          class="overflow-hidden bg-white text-center text-gray-800 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-gray-300"
        >
          <div class="my-4 grid grid-flow-col grid-cols-6">
            <button
              x-bind="prevYearButton"
              class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
            >
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                width="16"
                height="16"
                fill="currentColor"
                class="bi bi-chevron-double-left"
                viewBox="0 0 16 16"
              >
                <path
                  fill-rule="evenodd"
                  d="M8.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L2.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
                />
                <path
                  fill-rule="evenodd"
                  d="M12.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L6.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
                />
              </svg>
            </button>
            <button
              x-bind="prevMonthButton"
              class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
            >
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                width="16"
                height="16"
                fill="currentColor"
                class="bi bi-chevron-left"
                viewBox="0 0 16 16"
              >
                <path
                  fill-rule="evenodd"
                  d="M11.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L5.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
                />
              </svg>
            </button>
            <div
              x-text="currentDate"
              class="col-span-2 inline-block font-bold"
            ></div>
            <button
              x-bind="nextMonthButton"
              class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
            >
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                width="16"
                height="16"
                fill="currentColor"
                class="bi bi-chevron-right"
                viewBox="0 0 16 16"
              >
                <path
                  fill-rule="evenodd"
                  d="M4.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L10.293 8 4.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
                />
              </svg>
            </button>
            <button
              x-bind="nextYearButton"
              class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
            >
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                width="16"
                height="16"
                fill="currentColor"
                class="bi bi-chevron-double-right"
                viewBox="0 0 16 16"
              >
                <path
                  fill-rule="evenodd"
                  d="M3.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L9.293 8 3.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
                />
                <path
                  fill-rule="evenodd"
                  d="M7.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L13.293 8 7.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
                />
              </svg>
            </button>
          </div>
        
          <div class="mb-2 grid grid-cols-7">
            <template x-for="weekday in weekdays">
              <div
                x-text="weekday"
                class="text-sm font-semibold dark:text-gray-300"
              ></div>
            </template>
          </div>
        
          <div class="relative mb-2 grid grid-cols-7">
            <template x-for="d in days" :key="d.toISOString()">
              <button
                x-bind="day"
                x-text="d.getDate()"
                class="mx-1 my-1 flex h-9 w-9 cursor-pointer items-center justify-center rounded-full py-1 text-sm font-semibold hover:bg-neutral-200"
                class:today="!font-bold text-violet-400 dark:text-violet-400 border border-violet-400"
                class:adjacent="text-gray-800/20 dark:text-gray-200/10"
                class:selected="!text-white dark:text-gray-200 bg-violet-400 dark:bg-violet-500 hover:!bg-violet-600 dark:hover:bg-violet-700"
                class:selected-range="!text-white dark:text-gray-200 bg-violet-400 dark:bg-neutral-600 hover:!bg-violet-600 dark:hover:bg-neutral-500"
                class:partially-selected="text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-300 bg-gray-300 dark:bg-neutral-700"
              ></button>
            </template>
          </div>
        
          <div
            x-text="todayFormatted"
            class="bg-gray-100 py-1 text-sm font-semibold dark:bg-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-300"
          ></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
